attributes.action: Negotiate with our EU partner governments for the issue of free rail passes for EU wide travel to all European citizens over 60 or disabled.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have free movement of people but for many who are poor there is little hope of seeing our marvellous cities and historical monuments etc.Let Paris Rome and London etc. be available to all our people. This would discourage the use of motor cars and cheap flights and help to save the planetas well as helping to make the EU an example of civilised living to the entire world.
